On this page

运行时API示例 ​

本文演示VitePress提供的运行时API使用方法。

通过useData()API可以访问当前页面的站点、主题和页面数据，支持在.md和.vue文件中使用：

md
<script setup>
import { useData } from 'vitepress'

const { theme, page, frontmatter } = useData()
</script>

## 运行结果

### 主题数据
<pre>{{ theme }}</pre>

### 页面数据
<pre>{{ page }}</pre>

### 页面Frontmatter
<pre>{{ frontmatter }}</pre>

运行结果 ​

主题数据 ​

{
  "socialLinks": [
    {
      "icon": "github",
      "link": "https://github.com/pycharmikun1"
    }
  ],
  "footer": {
    "message": "Released under the MIT License.",
    "copyright": "Copyright © 2025 不爱剪辑的Y"
  },
  "editLink": {
    "pattern": "https://github.com/pycharmikun1/vitepress/edit/main/docs/:path",
    "text": "在 GitHub 上编辑此页面"
  },
  "nav": [
    {
      "text": "首页",
      "link": "/"
    },
    {
      "text": "指南文档",
      "link": "/guide/markdown-examples"
    }
  ],
  "sidebar": [
    {
      "text": "文档示例",
      "items": [
        {
          "text": "Markdown示例",
          "link": "/guide/markdown-examples"
        },
        {
          "text": "API使用示例",
          "link": "/guide/api-examples"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

页面数据 ​

{
  "title": "运行时API示例",
  "description": "",
  "frontmatter": {
    "outline": "deep"
  },
  "headers": [],
  "relativePath": "guide/api-examples.md",
  "filePath": "guide/api-examples.md"
}

页面Frontmatter ​

{
  "outline": "deep"
}
